channel.title: Adding Models help please!
channel.description: I went to go add some capes, and when I spawn them, they appear in the inventory as nothing.. but they are there. When I click them, I turn invisible, except 1... With the 1 cape, when I wear it, this angled lime green cape shows up. and when I click the capes, they appear in the weapons spot. i want them to appear in the cape spot, but when I turned them into .dat files, I put them as gloves.. Why is it doing that, and how do I fix it?

item.title: Adding Models help please!
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

In your source find item.java. You will see a bunch of ID’s, when you come across a list that says public static int capes[] Post the item ID which was included in your int’s.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Models help please!
item.dc:creator: @Rawrock Rawrock
item.description:
@Rawrock wrote:

I went to go add some capes, and when I spawn them, they appear in the inventory as nothing… but they are there. When I click them, I turn invisible, except 1… With the 1 cape, when I wear it, this angled lime green cape shows up. and when I click the capes, they appear in the weapons spot. i want them to appear in the cape spot, but when I turned them into .dat files, I put them as gloves… Why is it doing that, and how do I fix it?

Read full topic
